item.title: How Is The Fisherman Back In I Know What You Did Last Summer 2025?
item.description: The trailer for the new I Know What You Did Last Summer has been released, and the series' iconic villain is somehow set to make his return.

item.title: Who Is Sue Storm's Child in The Fantastic Four: First Steps?
item.description: Sue Storm and Reed Richards are expecting in The Fantastic Four: First Steps, but is their baby going to be beyond expectations?

item.title: 12 Marvel Movies & Shows To Watch Before Thunderbolts*
item.description: Thunderbolts* is scheduled to hit theaters on May 2, but you may want to rewatch these past MCU projects to better understand the new crossover movie.
